name: Boulevard Brawler
description:
Defend your honour as a ham-faced dandyman and defeat waves of ham-faced gentlemen using nothing more than your fists and brollys.

Controls:

- Movement: WASD or ARROW KEYS

- Basic Punch: E or NUM1

- Heavy Punch: F or NUM2

- Brolly Toss: Q or NUM3

- Block: SPACE
